attributes.action: Stand down and let someone else start getting this country back in shape, This includes Labour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's time for a change, millions of people Voted against Labour and the promise of an Election when Gordon Brown got into power is a forgotten Memory. The country is in a Nose dive and needs someone to do something constructive urgently, Not just tax us more and hope it will go away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
